programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.desc: Sara Davies puts Olly Smith and Scarlette Douglas to the festive test with Christmas crafts galore ranging from upcycling baubles to painting wine glasses.

programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.desc: Coronation Streets Daniel Brocklebank joins Ruth Langsford, Coleen Nolan, Janet Street-Porter and Mariella Frostrup in the studio to talk about leaving the cobbles for good.

programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Hoping to win the Lingo jackpot this time are pals Sean and Kyle from Glasgow, Harv and his mum Jas from London, and sisters Sharon and Becky from Grimsby.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Donna is given her opportunity to open the iconic red boxes and goes up against the Banker in a bid to take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Fiona from Gourock, Andie from Wallasey, Peter from Ealing and Stephanie from London - come together in the hope of taking down a Chaser.

programme.title: STV News at Six
programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Drama on the Yorkshire Dales with one of Britains longest-running and most beloved soaps.

programme.title: The Martin Lewis Money Show Live
programme.desc: Winter is coming and its time to prepare for the colder months ahead with Martins latest Big Briefing to combat the ever-rising cost of energy bills.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: The celebrities are settling into camp life and bonding with their fellow campmates, but someone must bring home the goods and win more stars at another trial.

programme.title: Changing Ends
programme.desc: Autobiographical comedy. Alan gets a shock regarding his future, and Christine gives an ill-judged interview in the local paper that causes friction on the close.
